channel.title: Trading on Data Science and Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Trading on Data Science and Engineering

item.title: An insight into an armchair trader
item.description: A summary of the Financial Times article ‘The secret life of an armchair trader’. Personally I’m sceptical, it has the feel of a paid advertising piece. It all sounds a little too idealised, and without substance. Like he’s trying to sell a story or self-image that he believes, or as one comment suggested, testing the water to write a book. That said, if all the content is true and is down to acquired knowledge rather than fortune, then I am very happy he enjoys what he does, and it works well enough to make a living from.
